Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 78th overall pick, by St. Louis in 2012...
Traded from St. Louis to Chicago (A) on 7/18/2012 (Going to STL: P J. Valverde. Going to CHA: LF M. Sierra, P J. Bradley)...
Injured on 8/16/2012 with a Pulled Achilles Tendon, out for 3-4 weeks...
Traded from Chicago (A) to Arizona on 1/31/2013 (Going to ARI: RF M. Sierra. Going to CHA: 1B G. Atkins)...
Had first career hit on 5/21/2016, off Hisashi Iwakuma (LAN)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/22/2016, off Drew Hutchinson (LAN)...
Drove in 6 runs against St. Louis on 9/1/2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/9/2019, hitting .556 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Won World Championship with Arizona in 2019...
Won Gold Glove Award at Leftfield in 2020...
